title: ==AP champions with good burst, cc and escape==
body:
Please tell me a good ap champion by commenting or vote in the poll below
{{champion:103}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:76}} please choose

**Please leave an example build too if you can thanks!**
{{item:3171}}

replies.body: AP Shaco isn't as good as it used to be - him and DFG got along so well. But, because DFG is rip, AD Shaco is better. Don't get me wrong, AP Shaco still works, but it's just harder now.
